titleStmt.title: Colonel Mittons reply to Lievtenant Colonell Reinkings relation of the taking of Shrewesburie: which was printed without license, though said (in the title thereof) to be published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Mitton, Thomas, 1597?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to order, by R. Austin,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place and date of publication from Wing.
A reply to: Reinking, William. A more exact and particular relation of the taking of Shrewsbury.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
